text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump LMAO. @POTUS is a racist, has decimated this country. We are laughed at by other countries and mocked. He incites hate and division. He failed miserably handling the #Coronavirus pandemic. Our economy is depressed and millions unemployed. Miss you @BarackObama https://t.co/uTjOffpFoV
